name: NEIKO 50400A Stainless Steel Lock and Flat Washer Assortment | 350 Piece Set | 12 Different Sizes in Spring Lock and Flat Design | Prevent Loose Fasteners
short_description: GALVANIZED STAINLESS STEEL: These lock and flat washers provide excellent protection and security for nuts and bolts. They are made with galvanized stainless steel for long-term use and outstanding durability.

VERSATILE & COMPATIBLE: These assorted washers come in multiple sizes to fit all your screws, nuts, and bolts. Each washer features a solid bearing surface to prevent the nut or bolt head from tearing through the material.

OPTIMAL SURFACE AREA: Each stainless-steel flat or lock washer easily deflects the screw or bolt load, spreading the weight evenly for a secure and sure fit. These washers for screws and bolts are ideal for use at home or in the workshop.

THE RIGHT SIZE: This set of washers contains a wide variety of sizes. It includes lock washers in sizes #6, #8, #10, 1/4", 5/16", and 3/8" and flat washers in sizes #6, #8, #10, 1/4", 5/16", and 3/8".

CONVENIENT STORAGE: Keep your washers ready for your next home or automotive project. This 350-piece set comes in a convenient, sturdy plastic box with divided compartments for easy storage and an inside lid display for easy organization.
product_description: Set comes with the following quantity of sizes: (50) #6 Lock Washer, (40) #8 Lock Washer, (30) #10 Lock Washer, (25) 1/4" Lock Washer, (15) 5/16" Lock Washer, (15) 3/8" Lock Washer, (50) #6 Flat Washer, (40) #8 Flat Washer, (30) #10 Flat Washer, (25) 1/4" Flat Washer, (15) 5/16" Flat Washer, (15) 3/8" Flat Washer

name: 600 Pieces 9 Sizes 304 Stainless Steel Flat Washers Assortment Kit (M2 M2.5 M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12)
short_description: 【Sizes】M2 M2.5 M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12, total 600 pieces/9 sizes of the most commonly used stainless steel washers in a plastic case, different size can satisfy your different needs.
【Design】Flat washers are designed for electrical connections on household and commercial appliances, automotive and marine uses in which the power source has a threaded/bolt-type connection.

【Material】304Stainless Steel, stainless steel material which have good corrosion resistance in bad environment like high temperature, cold weather, and high humidity areas. They have superior rust resistance and excellent oxidation resistance, which can ensure long time using.

【Weak Magnetic】The magnetic properties of 304 stainless steel due to the structure transformation reasons are not at the same level as the magnetic properties of stainless steel of other materials, which means that the magnetic properties of 304 steel always show weak magnetic properties.

【Wide Applications】Highly compatible with screws, nuts and bolts of same sizes and feature solid bearing surface to prevent nut/bolt head from tearing through material. Designed to spread the load of a screwed fastening and prevent loosening in industrial, shop, decks and fence building, automotive and home appliances.

short_description: 🔴 SAE #6 #8 #10 1/4 5/16 3/8 Spring Lock Washer, Flat Washer , Hex Nut , 431pcs Stainless Steel 304 offers excellent corrosion resistance, durability, strength, versatility, and hygiene.
🟢 Spring lock Washer (#6 40pcs) (#8 40pcs) (#10 30pcs) (1/4 15pcs) (5/16 12pcs) (3/810pcs) 🟡 Individual compartment, individual door, transparent case
Spring washers provide tension, preventing fasteners from loosening due to vibration or thermal expansion. They also distribute load evenly, reducing stress on surfaces
Flat washers distribute load evenly, reducing stress on surfaces and preventing damage. They also help to prevent loosening due to vibration, ensuring a secure and stable connection.
Hex nuts provide a strong, secure fastening due to their six-sided shape, which allows for easy wrench grip and torque application. They are versatile, widely used in various applications
